description: [BitTorrent Sync](http://www.bittorrent.com/sync) by BitTorrent Labs. Easy and effortless file replication between computers (and mobile devices) without using the cloud, so the only limit is available storage. All data transfers are encrypted. Works on Windows, Linux, OSX, Android and iOS. Recently they've [opened up their API](http://www.bittorrent.com/sync/developers/api) to developers.
ohloh_description: A list of public BitTorrent Sync keys
name: BitTorrent Sync
